meanings.definition: Not able to be decomposed or broken down into simpler parts.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle was indecomposable, with each piece uniquely fitting together.
meanings.sent2: The diamond was indecomposable, unable to be split into smaller fragments.
meanings.sent3: The indecomposable cake recipe left everyone amazed at its complexity.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was indecomposable, unbreakable and whole.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the twins was indecomposable, inseparable and strong.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being divided or separated into smaller components.
meanings.sent1: The indecomposable rope held the weight of the entire team without breaking.
meanings.sent2: The indecomposable rock formation stood tall against the forces of nature.
meanings.sent3: The indecomposable friendship between the two dogs always brought smiles.
meanings.sent4: His indecomposable determination to succeed inspired everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The indecomposable bond between the siblings was unbreakable and pure.
